text: Sparkle is a 2012 musical drama movie starring Jordin Sparks and Whitney Houston (in her final role). It is a remake of the same named 1976 motion picture, except the 2012 remake centers on 1960s Detroit. Sparkle was released in August 2012. Category:2012 musical movies Category:2012 drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies
title: Sparkle
